meanings.definition: A plant of the primrose family, typically with pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cyclamen in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely cyclamen to add color to my home.
meanings.sent3: The cyclamen seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delicate as a cyclamen in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The cyclamen's petals were as soft as a whisper.

meanings.definition: The tuber of the cyclamen plant, used in gardening.
meanings.sent1: I planted the cyclamen tuber carefully in the soil.
meanings.sent2: Gardening experts recommend starting cyclamen tubers indoors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the cyclamen tuber for a nut.
meanings.sent4: The cyclamen tuber held the promise of new life beneath the earth.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's hands gently cradled the cyclamen tuber.
